termsconditions_006: VLearn Platform is an online platform that provides a set of training and reinforcement courses in addition to automated tests generated from a question bank, in line with the approved curriculum in primary and secondary education. It connects service providers (specialized teachers providing content in the app) with users (primary and secondary students) who seek preparation and reinforcement courses and tests. The platform offers multiple subscriptions for users, electronic payment options, and promotional offers.

privacy_006: The privacy policy helps you understand our company’s commitments to protecting the privacy of VLearn users’ data, and how information is protected and used.

privacy_011: We collect technical information from the mobile device such as operating system, device type, connection type, and IP address for technical, contractual, and legal purposes.
